text: The 2018 New Holland Canadian Junior Curling Championships was held from January 13 to 21 at the Aréna Grand-Mère and the Centre municipal de curling de Shawinigan in Shawinigan, Québec. The winners represented Canada at the 2018 World Junior Curling Championships in Aberdeen, Scotland. ==Men== ===Round Robin Standings=== Final Round Robin Standings {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=2|Key |- | style="background:#ffffcc; width:20px;"| |align=left|Teams to Championship Pool |- | style="background:#ccffcc; width:20px;"| |align=left|Teams to Tiebreakers |} {| |valign=top width=10%| {| class="wikitable" |- !width=220| Pool A !!width=150| Skip !!width=15| W !!width=15| L |- bgcolor=#ffffcc | || Tyler Tardi || 5 || 1 |- bgcolor=#ffffcc | || J.T.
